18 import rospy
19 
20 from niryo_robot_status.msg import RobotStatus
21 
22 from ..common.storage_manager import StorageManager
23 from .top_button import TopButton
24 from .io_panel import IOPanel
25 from .fans_manager import FansManager
26 from .led_manager import LEDManager
27 from .shutdown_manager import ShutdownManager
28 
29 
30 class RobotRpi:
31 
32  def __init__(self):
33  self.__io_panel = IOPanel()
34  self.__fans_manager = FansManager()
35  self.__led_manager = LEDManager()
36  self.__niryo_robot_button = TopButton()
37  self.__shutdown_manager = ShutdownManager()
38  self.__storage_manager = StorageManager()
39 
40  rospy.on_shutdown(self.shutdown)
41 
42  self.robot_status_subscriber = rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_status/robot_status',
43  RobotStatus,
44  self.__callback_robot_status,
45  queue_size=10)
46 
47  def __callback_robot_status(self, msg):
48  if msg.robot_status <= RobotStatus.SHUTDOWN:
49  self.shutdown()
50 
51  def shutdown(self):
52  self.__fans_manager.shutdown()
53  self.__io_panel.shutdown()
54  rospy.sleep(2)
